00109 /* Missing prototypes */
00110 ssize_t pread(int fd, void *buf, size_t count, off_t offset);
00111 ssize_t pwrite(int fd, const void *buf, size_t count, off_t offset);

00130 cache_content_status_t  cache_content_open(  cache_content_entry_t        * pentry,
00131                                              cache_content_client_t       * pclient,
00132                                              cache_content_status_t       * pstatus ) 
00133 {
00134   cache_content_status_t  cache_content_status_ ;
00135   int                     localfd ;
00136 
00137   if( ( pentry == NULL ) || ( pstatus == NULL ) ) 
00138      return CACHE_CONTENT_INVALID_ARGUMENT ;
00139 
00140   if( pclient->use_cache == 0 ) 
00141     pentry->local_fs_entry.opened_file.last_op = 0 ; /* to force opening the file */
00142 
00143   if( ( pclient->use_cache == 0 ) ||
00144       ( time( NULL ) - pentry->local_fs_entry.opened_file.last_op  > pclient->retention ) )
00145    {
00146      
00147      if ( pentry->local_fs_entry.opened_file.local_fd > 0 )
00148      {
00149        close(  pentry->local_fs_entry.opened_file.local_fd ) ;
00150      }
00151      
00152      pentry->local_fs_entry.opened_file.local_fd = -1 ;
00153      pentry->local_fs_entry.opened_file.last_op = 0 ;
00154    }
00155  
00156   if( pentry->local_fs_entry.opened_file.last_op == 0 )
00157    { 
00158      /* Close file to be sure */
00159      if( pentry->local_fs_entry.opened_file.local_fd > 0 )
00160      {
00161        close( pentry->local_fs_entry.opened_file.local_fd ) ;
00162      }
00163        
00164      /* opened file is not preserved yet */
00165      if( ( localfd = open( pentry->local_fs_entry.cache_path_data, O_RDWR, 0750 ) ) == -1 )
00166        {
00167           if( errno == ENOENT )
00168             *pstatus = CACHE_CONTENT_LOCAL_CACHE_NOT_FOUND ;
00169           else
00170             *pstatus = CACHE_CONTENT_LOCAL_CACHE_ERROR ;
00171    
00172           return *pstatus ;
00173        }
00174        
00175      pentry->local_fs_entry.opened_file.local_fd = localfd ;
00176    }
00177    
00178   /* Regular exit */
00179   pentry->local_fs_entry.opened_file.last_op  = time( NULL ) ;
00180         
00181   *pstatus = CACHE_CONTENT_SUCCESS ;
00182   return *pstatus ;  
00183         
00184 } /* cache_content_open */
00185 
00202 cache_content_status_t cache_content_close( cache_content_entry_t        * pentry,
00203                                             cache_content_client_t       * pclient,
00204                                             cache_content_status_t       * pstatus ) 
00205 {
00206   if( ( pentry == NULL ) || ( pstatus == NULL ) ) 
00207      return CACHE_CONTENT_INVALID_ARGUMENT ;
00208 
00209   /* if nothing is opened, do nothing */
00210   if( pentry->local_fs_entry.opened_file.local_fd < 0 ) 
00211    {
00212      *pstatus = CACHE_CONTENT_SUCCESS ;
00213      return *pstatus ;
00214    }
00215 
00216   if( ( pclient->use_cache == 0 ) ||  
00217       ( time( NULL ) - pentry->local_fs_entry.opened_file.last_op  > pclient->retention ) ||
00218       ( pentry->local_fs_entry.opened_file.local_fd > pclient->max_fd_per_thread ) ) 
00219    {
00220      close(  pentry->local_fs_entry.opened_file.local_fd ) ;
00221      pentry->local_fs_entry.opened_file.local_fd = -1 ;
00222      pentry->local_fs_entry.opened_file.last_op = 0 ;
00223    }
00224 
00225   *pstatus = CACHE_CONTENT_SUCCESS ;
00226   return *pstatus ;
00227 } /* cache_content_close */
00228 
00229 
00230         
00255 cache_content_status_t cache_content_rdwr( cache_content_entry_t        * pentry,
00256                                            cache_content_io_direction_t   read_or_write,
00257                                            fsal_seek_t                  * seek_descriptor,
00258                                            fsal_size_t                  * pio_size_in,
00259                                            fsal_size_t                  * pio_size_out,
00260                                            caddr_t                        buffer, 
00261                                            fsal_boolean_t               * p_fsal_eof,
00262                                            struct stat                  * pbuffstat,
00263                                            cache_content_client_t       * pclient,
00264                                            fsal_op_context_t            * pcontext, 
00265                                            cache_content_status_t       * pstatus ) 
00266 {
00267   fsal_handle_t           * pfsal_handle = NULL ;
00268   fsal_status_t             fsal_status ;
00269   cache_inode_status_t      cache_inode_status ;
00270   cache_content_status_t    cache_content_status ;
00271   fsal_path_t               local_path ;
00272   int                       statindex ;
00273   off_t                     offset ;
00274   size_t                    iosize_before ;
00275   ssize_t                   iosize_after ;
00276   struct stat               buffstat ;
00277   
00278   *pstatus = CACHE_CONTENT_SUCCESS ;
00279 
00280 #ifdef _DEBUG_CACHE_CONTENT
00281   DisplayLogJdLevel( pclient->log_outputs, NIV_FULL_DEBUG, 
00282                      "---> DATA : IO Size IN = %llu fdsize=%d seeksize=%d", 
00283                      *pio_size_in, sizeof( fsal_file_t ), sizeof( fsal_seek_t ) ) ;
00284 #endif
00285 
00286   /* For now, only FSAL_SEEK_SET is supported */
00287   if( seek_descriptor->whence != FSAL_SEEK_SET )
00288     {
00289       DisplayLogJd( pclient->log_outputs, 
00290                     "Implementation trouble: seek_descriptor was not a 'FSAL_SEEK_SET' cursor" ) ;
00291       *pstatus = CACHE_INODE_INVALID_ARGUMENT ;
00292       return *pstatus ;
00293     }
00294   
00295   /* Set the statindex variable */
00296   switch( read_or_write )
00297     {
00298     case CACHE_CONTENT_READ:
00299       statindex = CACHE_CONTENT_READ_ENTRY ;
00300       break ;
00301       
00302     case CACHE_CONTENT_WRITE:
00303       statindex = CACHE_CONTENT_WRITE_ENTRY ;
00304       break ;
00305       
00306     default:
00307       *pstatus = CACHE_CONTENT_INVALID_ARGUMENT ;
00308       return *pstatus ;
00309       break ;
00310     }
00311   
00312   /* stat */
00313   pclient->stat.func_stats.nb_call[statindex] += 1 ;
00314   
00315   /* Get the fsal handle */
00316   if( ( pfsal_handle = cache_inode_get_fsal_handle( pentry->pentry_inode, &cache_inode_status) ) == NULL )
00317     {
00318       *pstatus = CACHE_CONTENT_BAD_CACHE_INODE_ENTRY ;
00319       
00320       DisplayLogJdLevel( pclient->log_outputs, NIV_MAJOR, 
00321                          "cache_content_new_entry: cannot get handle" ) ;
00322       /* stat */
00323       pclient->stat.func_stats.nb_err_unrecover[statindex] += 1 ;
00324       
00325       return *pstatus ;
00326     }
00327   
00328   /* Convert the path to FSAL path */
00329   fsal_status =  FSAL_str2path( pentry->local_fs_entry.cache_path_data, MAXPATHLEN, &local_path )  ;
00330   
00331   if( FSAL_IS_ERROR( fsal_status ) ) 
00332     {
00333       *pstatus = CACHE_CONTENT_FSAL_ERROR ;
00334       
00335       /* stat */
00336       pclient->stat.func_stats.nb_err_unrecover[statindex] += 1 ;
00337       
00338       return *pstatus ;
00339     }
00340   
00341   /* Parameters conversion */
00342   offset = cache_content_fsal_seek_convert( *seek_descriptor, pstatus ) ;
00343   if( *pstatus != CACHE_CONTENT_SUCCESS )
00344     {
00345       /* stat */
00346       pclient->stat.func_stats.nb_err_unrecover[statindex] += 1 ;
00347       
00348       return *pstatus ;
00349     }
00350 
00351   iosize_before = cache_content_fsal_size_convert( *pio_size_in , pstatus ) ;
00352   if( *pstatus != CACHE_CONTENT_SUCCESS )
00353   {
00354     /* stat */
00355     pclient->stat.func_stats.nb_err_unrecover[statindex] += 1 ;
00356     
00357     return *pstatus ;
00358     }
00359 
00360   /* Open the local fd for reading */
00361   if( cache_content_open( pentry, pclient, pstatus ) != CACHE_CONTENT_SUCCESS )
00362     {
00363       return *pstatus ;
00364     }
00365   
00366   /* Perform the IO through the cache */
00367   switch( read_or_write )
00368     {
00369     case CACHE_CONTENT_READ:
00370       /* The file content was completely read before the IO. The read operation is fully done locally */
00371       if( ( iosize_after = pread( pentry->local_fs_entry.opened_file.local_fd, buffer, iosize_before, offset ) ) == -1 )
00372         {
00373           /* stat */
00374           pclient->stat.func_stats.nb_err_unrecover[statindex] += 1 ;
00375           
00376           *pstatus = CACHE_CONTENT_LOCAL_CACHE_ERROR ;
00377           return *pstatus ;
00378         }
00379       
00380       if( ( cache_content_status = cache_content_valid( pentry, CACHE_CONTENT_OP_GET, pclient ) )  != CACHE_CONTENT_SUCCESS )
00381         {
00382            *pstatus = cache_content_status ;
00383            return *pstatus ;
00384         }
00385       
00386       /* Get the eof */
00387       if( iosize_after == 0 )
00388         *p_fsal_eof = TRUE ;
00389       else
00390         *p_fsal_eof = FALSE ;
00391           
00392       break ;
00393       
00394     case CACHE_CONTENT_WRITE:
00395       /* The io is done on the cache before being flushed to the FSAL */
00396       if( ( iosize_after = pwrite( pentry->local_fs_entry.opened_file.local_fd, buffer, iosize_before, offset ) ) == -1 )
00397         {
00398           /* stat */
00399           pclient->stat.func_stats.nb_err_unrecover[statindex] += 1 ;
00400           
00401           *pstatus = CACHE_CONTENT_LOCAL_CACHE_ERROR ;
00402           return *pstatus ;
00403         }
00404       
00405       if( ( cache_content_status = cache_content_valid( pentry, CACHE_CONTENT_OP_SET, pclient ) ) != CACHE_CONTENT_SUCCESS )
00406         {
00407             *pstatus = cache_content_status ;
00408            return *pstatus ;
00409         }
00410 
00411       /* p_fsal_eof has no meaning here, it is unused */
00412 
00413       break ;
00414     }
00415 
00416   /* close the local fd */
00417   if( cache_content_close( pentry, pclient, pstatus ) != CACHE_CONTENT_SUCCESS )
00418     return *pstatus ;
00419   
00420   *pio_size_out = (fsal_size_t)iosize_after ;
00421 
00422   /* Return the 'stat' as seen in the cache */
00423   if( stat( pentry->local_fs_entry.cache_path_data, &buffstat ) == -1  ) 
00424     {
00425         *pstatus = CACHE_CONTENT_LOCAL_CACHE_ERROR ;
00426     }
00427   else
00428    {
00429         if( pbuffstat != NULL )
00430           *pbuffstat = buffstat ;
00431    }
00432 
00433   
00434   return *pstatus ;
00435 } /* cache_content_rdwr */
